name: Apparition
detailed_description:
Features

  • Interactive Ouija board that answers your own questions
  • Different apparitions roaming the forest
  • Earn those precious points, barely escaping with your life
  • It will scare the bejeezus out of you!


About the Game

Apparition is a first-person survival horror game set in a fictional, haunted American forest, Green Creek. There are terrible stories about this place. To wander around there at night you must be a lunatic - or an ambitious paranormal activity investigator.

RECORD THE DEAD, STAY ALIVE

During the night in the forest, you fight for more evidence of the existence of ghosts and for your own life.

Speak with the dead with a Ouija board. Use your camera and audio recorder to register them, putting yourself in dire risk. There’s no defense against the ghosts or demons other than hiding.

CHOSE YOUR GEAR

The more traces of ghosts you record, the more points you earn. Use them to upgrade your gear and access new places. But you have to get out alive to keep them.

Will you survive? The better question might be – for how long? Keep trying.

short_description: Hope you packed an extra pair because this survival horror is really freaking scary. Find yourself smack in the middle of a haunted forest in the dead of night. Talk to spirits through your Ouija board. Capture evidence of the paranormal, but beware, fiercely aggressive demons are on the hunt.
